name: Frogs'n Ladybugs
description: This is my first published project and I'm very aware that it is not the best, I was playing around with the idea of a grappling hook for my current, bigger project and I stumbled upon this movement, I decided to make a short time-waster game on it and I made it in 1 day. I don't know how to draw pixel art, I'm still learning and still bad, I didn't make the background music, I used free music from a youtuber called RedfeasMusic and it works very well ,I thank him very much. The rest of the sounds were made with chiptunes, the engine is Game Maker  Studio 2, and I made the drawings in Gimp even though they look like MSPaint .
